name: Twin Fang [4]
description: Blades fashioned with deadly fangs of a demon lord. Favoured weapons of the Dark Brotherhood assassins, these legendary blades have never failed to kill their target
stats: Convert [Enchant Deadly Poison] delay into a cooldown.
bonuses: 50% more damage with [Meteor Assault]. 50% less cast time with [Meteor Assault]
25% more damage with [Soul Breaker]. 50% less cast time with [Soul Breaker]
[Enchant Poison] endows Shadow instead of Poison. 10% more damage against Holy Element during [Enchant Poison]
Add a 15% chance to inflict Deadly Poison status on target when attacking. Deadly Poison interval reduced by 75%
Demon Race, Insect Race, and Detector Mobs can no longer see you when hidden; Fails against boss monsters
[Soul Breaker] inflicts more damage depending on the target's Defense
While under [Cloaking]: 25% faster base movement speed
While under [Cloaking]: Immunity to [Quagmire] and [Slow Grace]; Dispel Cloak on unequip
